text: Matthew Ian Senreich (born June 17, 1974) is an American screenwriter, television producer, director and voice actor best known for his work on the Adult Swim animated television series Robot Chicken, which he co-created with his business partner and close friend Seth Green. ==Other websites== * Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Screenwriters from New York (state) Category:American animators Category:American television directors
title: Matthew Senreich
